I had thought of the dubious 18. e5 exchange sac but after ...Bxh1 19. Bg6+ Kd8 20. Rxh1 dxe5 21. Qd2 hxg5 22. Be3 Rc8 23. Nd5 Qd6 24. Nxe7 Qxe7 25. Bb7 Rc7 26 Bxa6 which sacs the exchange but loses a pawn as well and after 26... Rxh4 27. Rxh4 gxh4 Black has 4 passed pawns and these out weigh blacks king being stuck in the center.
